channel.title: Apocalypse World BO: Nuclear Winter Wonderland
channel.description:
It's Wintertime in the Wasteland. The Warlords are gearing up for the holidays, and there's a lot of work for those who know where to look. Try to keep warm, it's rough out there.
*Attendance at all 4 sessions is preferred.*
Session 1: Tuesday, 29 November https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDP8vzahcImHYqid3WX
Session 2: Tuesday, 6 December https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDP90sgxHdGeR4_Etmi
Session 3 Tuesday, 13 December https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDP95XyuAXbWe0rvQrj
Session 4: Tuesday, 20 December https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDP9Dr09hE2lak5T7-2
**We're playing Apocalypse World: Burned Over.**
Thematically the game focuses on: Being hot. Surviving a horrific world. Keeping it together as best as possible. What to do when there isn't enough of anything to go around.
And there’s something really wrong with the world, and I don’t know what it is. The world wasn’t always like this, blasted and brutal. There wasn’t always a psychic maelstrom howling just out of your perception, waiting for you to open your brain so that it can rush in. Who fucked the world up, and how? Is there a way back? A way forward? If anybody’s going to ever find out, it’s you and your characters.
I will send a reminder 1 week before the session. Rules will be taught.
**CW:** Apocalypse (it's in the title), winter, Winter Holidays (yep, those ones), economic oppression, cheating, lying, betrayal, and struggle for day to day survival. Oh, and a high likelihood of weapons, violence, and other mayhem.
**Tone:** It's the apocalypse and life is really hard, but we can wink at it a bit and laugh to cover the pain.
**System** : Apocalypse World, Burned Over
**Duration** : 3 Hours
**Breaks** : 5-10 minutes approximately on the hour
**Venue** : GM’s Zoom
**Recording** : No
**Safety** : Session Zero, Lines & Veils, X-card, and open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
